agreementScopeList.li1: The {appName} Service Agreement (hereinafter referred to as 'this Agreement') is an effective agreement entered into by the {appName} service provider and the {appName} user (hereinafter referred to as 'user' or 'you') regarding the service and related matters. By clicking to confirm on the web page or otherwise accepting this Agreement, you represent that you have entered into this Agreement with us and agree to accept all the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
agreementScopeList.li2: In order to further improve the user experience, we will continue to update the service and provide users with updates such as version upgrades, feature upgrades, and rule upgrades. This Agreement may also be updated accordingly.

accountRegistrationList.li1: You are responsible for properly safeguarding the security of your registered account and password information, and you need to take legal responsibility for the behavior under your registered account. You shall bear all risks, liabilities, losses, expenses, etc. caused by the impersonation, theft, or illegal use of your account, password, and other information due to your own reasons.
accountRegistrationList.li2: You may cancel your account at any time. Please note that account cancellation is an irreversible operation. Once you cancel your account, we will delete all information in your account, unless otherwise provided by applicable laws and regulations. You will not be able to access relevant services through the cancelled account.

lawfulUseList.li1: You shall comply with the relevant laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China and the country or region where you belong or reside, and shall not use the provided services for any illegal purposes or in any illegal manner.
lawfulUseList.li2: You promise that the content you send or disseminate shall have a legal source, and the related content belongs to you or you have obtained authorization from the right holder.

contentRulesList.li1: The content you publish (including but not limited to web pages, texts, images, audios, videos, and charts) only represents your personal stance and viewpoint, and does not represent our stance or viewpoint. As the publisher of content, you shall take responsibility for the content you publish. If any disputes arise from the published content, you shall bear legal liability.
contentRulesList.li2: The copyright of all original content published by users on {appName} belongs to the users themselves. Users can authorize third parties to use it in any way without the consent of {appName}.
contentRulesList.li3: In order to promote the sharing and dissemination of the content you create, the public content you publish through the {appName} service grants us a free and non-exclusive license to use it. We can use this content for the development and operation of products and services.
contentRulesList.li4: The copyright of all original content published by users on {appName} belongs to the users themselves. Users can authorize third parties to use it in any way without the consent of {appName}.
contentRulesList.li5: If a third party needs to reproduce the copyrighted content that a user has published on {appName}, they shall contact the user for authorization or use the content in the manner specified by the user.
contentRulesList.li6: In order to create a green, sunny, and healthy online environment, we have the right to review and supervise the behavior of users who use the provided services and the content generated by them according to laws, regulations, and regulatory requirements. In order to improve the quality and efficiency of the review, we may cooperate with third parties to provide such services to users. You agree that we will provide the content you generate on the {appName} service to third parties for review, and you also agree that third parties can provide us with feedback on the review results for verification.
contentRulesList.li7: If we discover or receive reports from others that the content you have published violates laws, regulations, or the provisions of this agreement, we have the right to make independent judgments and take technical measures such as deletion, blocking, or disconnection of links. At the same time, we have the right to take measures such as suspending or terminating services, restricting, freezing, or terminating account usage, and pursuing legal liability based on the nature of your behavior.
contentRulesList.li8: If you find that the content in the {appName} service infringes on your legitimate rights and interests (including but not limited to portrait rights, copyright, etc.), you can contact us, and we will provide you with assistance to resolve the issue.

informationSecurityList.li1: Protecting user personal information and data security is one of our basic principles.
informationSecurityList.li2: We will try our best to protect the data generated by your use of this service and take reasonable preventive measures for data transmission, storage, and conversion. However, there may be certain unknown and uncertain data security risks in internet data transmission, storage, and conversion. You confirm that you are aware of and agree to accept such risks and consequences caused by the internet, and have taken appropriate measures to minimize losses in the event of such risks.

intellectualPropertyList.li1: No one shall use, modify, reverse compile, copy, publicly disseminate, alter, distribute, publish or publicly disclose the content or program of this website without our consent.
intellectualPropertyList.li2: Respecting intellectual property rights is your obligation. If you violate them, you shall bear liability for damages.

forceMajeureList.li1: We shall not be liable for any losses suffered by users due to force majeure events. Force majeure events include but are not limited to: natural disasters such as typhoons, floods, and hail; government actions such as requisition and expropriation; service interruption caused by computer viruses or hacker attacks, the Internet, communication lines, and other reasons.
forceMajeureList.li2: You understand and agree that in the process of using this service, you may encounter risks brought about by network information or other user behaviors. We do not assume responsibility for the authenticity, applicability, and legality of any information, nor for the damages caused to you by any infringement.
forceMajeureList.li3: We shall not be liable for any losses suffered by users that are not caused by us.

serviceChangesList.li1: In order to improve user experience, improve service content, or ensure the security and consistency of this service's functionality, we may update, enhance, upgrade, modify, or transfer this service or related functions and application software at any time.
serviceChangesList.li2: If the service is interrupted or terminated due to natural disasters, failures of other information service providers, maintenance, repair, malfunction of related information equipment and software, or any other irresistible factors, this shall not be considered a breach of contract by us, but we shall minimize the impact of such factors on users as much as possible.

legalApplicabilityList.li1: The establishment, effectiveness, interpretation, revision, supplement, termination, execution, and dispute resolution of this agreement shall be governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. If there are no relevant provisions in the law, commercial customs or industry practices shall apply.
legalApplicabilityList.li2: Disputes arising from your use of the service shall be resolved through consultation between us and you. If consultation fails, either party may bring a lawsuit to the people's court with jurisdiction over the defendant's domicile.
legalApplicabilityList.li3: If any provision of this agreement is deemed invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, such provision shall be deemed divisible and shall not affect the validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions of this agreement.

PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseTechnologies: How We Use Technologies like Cookies
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeStoreAndProtectInfo: How We Store and Protect Information
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeProvideInfoToOthers: How We Provide Information to Others
PrivacyPolicyPage.howYouExerciseYourRights: How You Exercise Your Personal Information Rights
PrivacyPolicyPage.applicabilityAndUpdates: Applicability and Updates of this Policy

overviewList.li1: We will collect, store, protect, and use your personal information in accordance with the principles of legality, legitimacy, necessity, and good faith.
overviewList.li2: If we need to obtain your information from a third party in order to provide you with services, we will require the third party to explain the source of the information and to ensure the legality of the information provided. If the personal information processing activities we conduct for business purposes exceed the scope of authorization you originally provided to the third party, we will obtain your explicit consent.

howWeCollectInfoList.li1: In accordance with relevant laws and regulations and national standards, we may lawfully process your personal information in the following situations: with your consent; when necessary to conclude and perform a contract at your request; when necessary to fulfill legal obligations, such as anti-money laundering, anti-terrorism financing, real-name management, and other necessary information required by relevant laws and regulations; when directly related to national security and national defense; when necessary to protect the life, health, and property safety of natural persons in response to public health emergencies or in emergency situations; when directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial, and execution of judgments; when the personal information collected is voluntarily disclosed by you; when personal information is collected from legally publicized information, such as legal news reports, government information disclosures, and other channels; when necessary to ensure the safe and stable operation of the services provided, such as detecting and handling product or service malfunctions; or in other situations as provided by laws and regulations.
howWeCollectInfoList.li2: Please understand that the services we provide to you are constantly updated and developed. Based on the service purposes, we may need to collect other information from you and explain the scope, purpose, and method of information collection to you through page prompts, interactive processes, and agreement provisions, and obtain your authorization. We will use, store, and protect your information in accordance with this policy and the relevant service agreement provisions. If you choose not to provide the aforementioned information, you may not be able to use certain services or parts thereof, but it will not affect your use of other services we provide.

howWeUseTechnologiesList.li1: To provide you with a more convenient browsing experience, when you visit our website or use our services, we may identify your identity through small data files, which can help you save the step of repeatedly entering registration information or help determine the security status of your account. These data files may be cookies or other local storages provided by your browser or related applications (hereinafter referred to as “cookies”).
howWeUseTechnologiesList.li2: If your browser or browser add-on service allows, you can modify the degree of acceptance of cookies or reject related cookies. The “Help” section of most browser toolbars will tell you how to prevent your browser from accepting new cookies, how to notify you when you receive a new cookie, or how to completely disable cookies. In addition, you can close or delete the similar data used by browser add-ons by changing the settings of the browser add-ons or by visiting the provider's webpage. However, in some cases, this may affect your secure access to our website and the use of related services.

howWeStoreAndProtectInfoList.li1: The personal information we collect and generate within the territory of the People's Republic of China will be stored within the territory of the People's Republic of China. If we need to transfer your personal information overseas due to product or service updates, we will comply with laws, regulations, and relevant regulatory authorities' provisions and require overseas organizations to keep your personal information confidential through effective measures such as signing agreements and on-site inspections. We will only retain your personal information for the necessary period and within the time limits specified by laws, regulations, and regulatory requirements described in this policy.
howWeStoreAndProtectInfoList.li2: To ensure the security of your information, we will take various reasonable and necessary measures to protect it after collecting it. For example, in the technical development environment, we only use de-identified information for statistical analysis. When providing research reports to third parties, we will de-identify the information contained in the report. We will store the de-identified information separately from personally identifiable information to ensure that individuals are not re-identified during subsequent processing of the de-identified information.
howWeStoreAndProtectInfoList.li3: While we take strict information security measures to protect your personal information, please be sure to keep your identity elements properly. We will use your identity elements to identify you when you use {appName}. If you disclose the aforementioned information, you may suffer losses and may be disadvantaged. If you find that your identity elements may or have been leaked, please contact us immediately so that we can take appropriate measures to prevent or reduce any related losses.
howWeStoreAndProtectInfoList.li4: After you stop using {appName}, we will stop collecting and using your personal information, except as otherwise provided by laws, regulations, or regulatory authorities. If we cease operations, we will promptly stop collecting and using your personal information, notify you of the cessation of operations individually or through a public announcement, and delete or anonymize the personal information we hold.

howWeUseInfoList.li1: To provide services that are tailored to you, provide service status notifications, and continuously maintain, improve, analyze, process, or otherwise process your information.
howWeUseInfoList.li2: Report to relevant departments or cooperate with investigations in accordance with legal regulations or regulatory requirements.

howWeProvideInfoToOthersList.li2: Sharing necessary for providing you with the service. Some products or services may be provided by third parties or jointly provided by us and third parties. Therefore, sharing your information is necessary to provide you with the products or services you need.
howWeProvideInfoToOthersList.li3: Due to regulatory inspections or legitimate requests from administrative and judicial authorities.

howYouExerciseYourRightsList.li1: We will use appropriate technical means to ensure that you can access, update, correct, and obtain your personal information. However, for security and identity verification (such as number appeal services) considerations or mandatory provisions under laws and regulations, you may not be able to modify the initial registration information and other verification information provided at registration.
howYouExerciseYourRightsList.li2: You can view your nickname, avatar, and registration information and other personal information by accessing the 'My' interface. If you find errors or incompleteness in the personal information we collect and store, or if you find that our collection and use of your personal information violates laws and regulations or violates the agreement with you, you can contact us to request correction, supplementation, or deletion.
howYouExerciseYourRightsList.li3: When you meet the agreed account cancellation conditions and cancel the relevant account, we will delete all personal information in your account according to legal requirements or anonymize it. However, if the relevant personal information is not due to the legal retention period or other circumstances that are not suitable for deletion or anonymization, we will stop processing it except for storage and necessary security protection measures.
howYouExerciseYourRightsList.li4: When we cooperate with third-party organizations to provide services to you, the third-party organization will inform you of the relevant information of the personal information processor in accordance with their published privacy policy or other terms signed with you (if any) and strictly protect your information and inform you of the way to exercise your personal information rights according to applicable requirements. Please read the relevant policies and terms carefully. If you have any questions, you can consult the third-party organization according to the service you use.

thirdPartyResponsibilityList.li1: Please note that the third-party website operators you visit and the third-party services accessed through {appName} may have their own privacy policies. When you view web pages created by third parties or use applications developed by third parties, these third parties may place their own Cookies or network Beacons, which are not under our control, and their use is not subject to this policy. We will strive to require these entities to take protective measures for your personal information and suggest that you contact them for details about their privacy policies. If you find risks in the web pages created by these third parties or the applications developed by third parties, it is recommended that you terminate the relevant operations to protect your legitimate rights and interests.
thirdPartyResponsibilityList.li2: In addition, some {appName} services need to be provided to you jointly by us and third parties (such as content sharing functions). Therefore, {appName} will embed third-party software development kits (SDKs) or other similar applications in it. {appName} will strictly check the SDKs or other similar applications for security and require third parties to take strict data protection measures to protect your legitimate rights and interests.

applicabilityAndUpdatesList.li1: This policy applies to {appName} services, but is excepted if the relevant products or services hosted have independent privacy policies or special agreements in the corresponding user service agreement.
applicabilityAndUpdatesList.li2: When there are significant changes, we will update this policy in a timely manner. If this policy is updated, we will notify you by email, pop-up message, short message, or announcement on the official website. The updated content will take effect from the date specified in the aforementioned notification. In order for you to receive timely notifications, it is recommended that you notify us promptly when updating your contact information (such as mobile phone number, email address, etc.).
